text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov Trump is a bumbling idiot that can’t complete a coherent sentence!  He has asked hospitals to send the coronavirus information directly to the White House & bypass the CDC (the experts). The administration doesn’t have a clue I predict disaster! He’s not qualified to be president
